pr_title: Revert removal of a Netty GraalVM tweak

timeline.message:
Revert "Remove no more needed netty unsafe accessed fields"

This reverts commit 14a6eb6da5dbed554a3e537319e3ea9bcb39accd.
Remove TODO as apparently it's not something fixed in Netty
Let's run the tests for native JDK 11 because that's what we want :)

timeline.author: Sanne
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -42,7 +42,7 @@ jobs:
         run: mvn -B install -DskipTests -DskipITs -Dno-format
 
       - name: Run integration tests in native
-        run: mvn -B  --settings azure-mvn-settings.xml verify -f integration-tests/pom.xml -DskipTests  -Dno-format -Ddocker -Dnative -Dquarkus.native.container-build=true -Dquarkus.native.builder-image=quay.io/quarkus/ubi-quarkus-native-image:19.3.1-java${{ matrix.java }} -Dtest-postgresql -Dtest-elasticsearch -Dtest-mysql -Dtest-dynamodb -Dtest-vault -Dtest-neo4j

replies.bodyText: So I think @geoand supposed that just dropping -DskipITs was enough and to be honest I'm a bit surprised myself. But I tested it and -DskipTests also disables failsafe.
replies.author: gsmet
